comments.html:
Ugh. I don't do TCL, but I do use two products from ActiveState - their Python distribution and the Komodo IDE (not to be confused with the Komodo Editor, which is free).

I would recommend for you to take the Komodo IDE for a walk :)
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: I have learned a lot with TCLTutor software. The software is old, but it runs on XP.
